name: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars
summary: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars is the 21st limit-removing project from the inglorious bastards themselves: the Doomer Boards Krew. Featuring nine maps of outrageous soon-to-be-banned-in-Germany action, not to mention possibly the most sector swastikas ever assembled in a single WAD file, OSotTRoM is a timely reminder that the only good Nazi demon is a dead Nazi demon. On Mars.
